title: Stores
desc:
Using the Stores web app, users can overlay different Venetian shops on top of one another on a digital map. The stores can be filtered by type, as well as whether they are geared towards locals or tourists. Additionally, users can view a heat map of the stores, generally conveying the frequencies of different types of stores around the island.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
